    svc := cloudwatchevents.New(sess)

    _, err := svc.PutTargets(&cloudwatchevents.PutTargetsInput{
        Rule: rule,
        Targets: []*cloudwatchevents.Target{
            &cloudwatchevents.Target{
                Arn: lambdaARN,
                Id:  targetID,
            },
        },
    })
